chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The package hasn't arrived. Delivery dates not fulfilled by UPS
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile

This is Maria from Back Market Customer Care, We hope you're having a great day.

I wanted to kindly remind you that our valued customer requested the invoice. According to Article 2.7 of our Quality Charter, I kindly ask if you could provide the invoice within 48 hours. We truly appreciate your prompt assistance in this matter.

Please make sure that the invoice contains:

➢ The customer's billing address
➢ The mention or any other equivalent
➢ The IMEI number (if the device is a smartphone)

If you need more information about the invoice, here is an article that will answer your questions: https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360019750759-How-to-establish-a-B2C-invoice-that-is-compliant-with-the-law-

In the event that we do not receive the invoice within the specified timeframe, we will have to apply the Back Market Charter. This means that we will grant a commercial gesture to the customer worth €50 at your expense. We sincerely hope it doesn't come to that and that we can resolve this smoothly together.

We count on you, thanks for your continued partnership and support.

Regards,
Maria from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Attatched is the Proof of delivery.

Regards,
JH
